ygData.subject: Re: lots of money...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would save it for spells too.  There s a bunch of level 8 spells.  Then ugh, level 12 spells wiped me out. I spent 60 plat so far and need to get a bunch
ygData.messageBody:
>At 03:05 PM 6/10/99 EDT, you wrote:
>>From: MooMooYou3@...
>>
>>I, a simple level three enchanter, have come into the posession of a large
>>sum of money - around 26 plat. So, I ask you, what should I do with it?

I would save it for spells too. There's a bunch of level 8 spells. Then
ugh, level 12 spells wiped me out.
I spent 60 plat so far and need to get a bunch more.

If you don't have cloth armor, I would get some. The pieces are only like
a gold or two.

Azboklin
